name: MySQL linking exception 2018
notes: this exception started showing up in all MySQL headers with MySQL 8.0 in 2018 See https://github.com/mysql/mysql-server/commit/c019b26f951a6ace68629c731933c2dfaae2239c
license_body:
This program is also distributed with certain software (including
but not limited to OpenSSL) that is licensed under separate terms,
as designated in a particular file or component or in included license
documentation.  The authors of MySQL hereby grant you an additional
permission to link the program and your derivative works with the
separately licensed software that they have included with MySQL.
